document_data.name: Evan Ghastkill
document_data.mainbody: '''Evan Ghastkill the Younger''' was the scion of the prominent [[Ghastkill]] family of [[Nashkel]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Evan the Younger was (in the opinion of his family) a headstrong, dull, impatient, and overly arrogant fellow.
document_data.Relationships: Evan was the child and heir of Lord [[Evan Ghastkill]] and [[Cara Ghastkill|Cara]].
document_data.History: His father Lord Evan had been very ill for a long time and was not expected to live through 1370 DR. While Evan the Younger was anxious to take up his father's role, both his mother Cara and his uncle [[Berrun Ghastkill|Berrun]] believed that Evan's poor personal traits made him incapable of effectively managing the family's considerable finances.
